name: Bloo Kid
overview: Bloo Kid is back with his debut game on the Nintendo Switch! Rescue your beloved one from the hands of the evil wizard in this retro-style 2D platformer with cute pixel art, chiptune soundtrack and challenging one-screen levels! Jump and run your way through 96 action-packed levels spread across EIGHT unique worlds. Clear a level without getting hit to receive the "flawless" star. Grab the star at the end of a level to receive the "special" star. Collect as many stars as possible to unlock all achievements.
